foodData.aboutdescripton: An authentic veg platter with 3 pieces of Paneer Achari, 3 pieces of Hara Bhara,3 pieces of Veg Seekh and 3 pieces of Malai Chaap.
An authentic non veg platter with 3 pieces of Barnala Mathi Chicken Tikka,3 pieces of Dhaniya Chicken,and 3 pieces of Chicken Kebab.
An authentic mixed platter with 3 pieces of Barnala Methi Chicken, 3 pieces of Hara Bhara and 3 pieces of Paneer Tikka.
Succulent chicken marinated & flavoured with fresh coriander,grilled to perfection.
Tender chicken smeared in rich cream flavoured with herbs and spices.
